content:
Overview # Navidrome is a self-hosted, open source music server and streamer. It gives you the freedom to listen to your music collection from any device, anywhere.
Our instance is hosted at: https://music.pattyjog.al
Getting an Account # To get an account on this Navidrome instance, please contact the administrator. Currently, public registration is disabled to ensure quality of service and security.
Recommended Clients # Navidrome is compatible with all Subsonic-compatible clients. Here are some recommended ones:
Mobile # Android: Symfonium, Dsub iOS: Amperfy, play:Sub Desktop # Web: Use the web interface at music.pattyjog.al Sonixd: Github - A full-featured desktop client for Subsonic and Jellyfin. Configuration # When setting up your client, use the following details:
Server URL: https://music.pattyjog.al Username: Your assigned username Password: Your assigned password
title: Navidrome Setup
